overview:
Phil Morle is a Chief Technology Officer (CTO) with experience running massive scale consumer web businesses.

For five years he was CTO of the massive and controversial Kazaa file-sharing application that was downloaded over 300 million times and had up to 5 million users online at any one time. He is a specialist in managing technology teams in chaotic environments and bridging the gulf between the goals of business and the technology to power it.

Currently, Phil is co- founder of web incubator Pollenizer and heads up the product and engineering division.
